title: Barkeep1.1
body: Welcome to the Sleeping Demon! What can I get ya? [[Answer:Player69|Player2.1]] [[Answer:Player2.2|Player2.2]] [[Answer:Player2.3|Player2.3]]

title: Player2.1
body: I would like your strongest drink, please and thank you &&&drunk 2&&& [[Answer:Barkeep3.1|Barkeep3.1]]

title: Player2.2
body: A bed would be absolutely lovely at the moment [[Answer:Barkeep3.2|Barkeep3.2]]

title: Barkeep3.1
body: I will warn you, it'll melt the shell off a garden snail

title: Barkeep3.2
body: You're in luck, we actually have a free bed
